briefdescription.para: Handles all incoming messages from the controller. If new message is available, receive message and pass to handler function. If handler function returns response message, send out.

Formats an instruction string into an instruction struct. Message is broken into 3 parts: Instruction Code, Instruction ID, Instruction Parameter then returns the parts as an Instruction Object Also, the Instruction Valid parameter is set accordingly.
Called once to initialize all modules. Runs once at the beginning of the program. Calls all module *.begin() functions.
Handles all outgoing messages to the controller. Polls all objects using their *.get() function and appends to message stream Sends message stream to controller.

Messages from controller are handled by this function. Each message is a single instruction string. Instruction string gets broken into instruction code, id, and parameter. Passed in piecewise to <module>.set function. If a return message is generated from the <module>.set function, this function returns that message.
Handles all module integration. See module_handler.h for details.
